input.true: border: 2px solid green; transition: all 0.3s ease
input.false: border: 2px solid hsl(0, 93%, 68%); transition: all 0.3s ease
input.default: border: 2px solid hsl(0, 36%, 70%); transition: all 0.3s ease

sbtBtn.true: padding: 11px; border-radius: 50px; width: 40px; text-align: center; background: linear-gradient(to right, lightgreen, green);box-shadow: lightgreen 0px 5px 20px 2px; transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
sbtBtn.false: transform: scale(1.1); width: 70px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, hsl(0, 80%, 86%), hsl(0, 74%, 74%));box-shadow: 0px 5px 9px 0px hsl(0, 36%, 70%); transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
sbtBtn.default: padding: 11px; border-radius: 50px; width: 40px; text-align: center; background: linear-gradient(to right, hsl(0, 36%, 70%), hsl(0, 93%, 68%));box-shadow: 0px 5px 9px 0px hsl(0, 36%, 70%); transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
